page.title: 08CYCLING AND THE BMX TRACK
page.content: P.C.Quibell is the founder and chairman of the Bicycle Moto-Cross Club (BMX) on Bowbridge Road,Newark. The building of the track began in November 1983 and opened in March 1984 The track is open everyday. Race meetings are held on Sundays and Tuesday evenings. To ride on the track you need your own BMX bike, gloves, helmets and pads. Anyone from 3 to 17 years of age can use the club.The club is well supported and occasionally Regional meetings are held.During races 2 main rules are applied (i) The referee is{always}right (ii)If the referee is wrong then rule (i) applies!! Spectators are not allowed to complain about the racing. Complaints must come from the riders themselves. Despite the dangers so far there have been no serious injuries.
